bibl.note: Periodically updated since 2002: see now Francesca ANGIÒ, Martine CUYPERS, B.A.-H. and E.K., "Version 12.1, newly revised and updated", August 2011, 43 pp.
bibl.seg: ACOSTA-HUGHES Benjamin and Elizabeth KOSMETATOU (Edd.), New Poems Attributed to Posidippus: A Text-in-progress = Classics@: An Online Journal 1 (2002).
Washington, D.C., Center for Hellenic Studies, Harvard University, 2002, 33 pp. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://chs.harvard.edu/wa/pageR?tn=ArticleWrapper&bdc=12&mn=1167 >.]
